text: Inside Trump's Decision to Skip the G.O.P. Why Trump might regret passing on the first debate  —  In recent nominating contests, the nationally televised shoutfests have prompted significant shifts in polling afterward.  —  Donald Trump wants to deprive his competitors of any oxygen.  That's why the former president is likely skipping next week's debate in Milwaukee.

DeSantis meets privately with Kemp in Georgia  —  The meeting follows Donald Trump's indictment in the state.  —  Ron DeSantis met privately with Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp on Friday, the latest in his effort to fortify relationships with three Republican governors alienated by Donald Trump.
